        "CALCULATION": "csv.RCPT_TOT_HOTEL_OWN_VAL + csv.RCPT_TOT_HOTEL_OWN3RD_VAL"
    }
]

for (const json of items) {
    const naicsStatus = json["NAICS/Tax status"];
    const unit = json["UNIT"];
    const derivedItem = json["DERIVED ITEM"];
    const calculation = json["CALCULATION"];

    if (
        naicsStatus &&
        unit === csv["UNIT"]
    ) {
        if (naicsStatus == "All") {
            try {
                const derivedValue = eval(calculation);
                csv[derivedItem] = derivedValue;
                csv.Perm = json["Temp or Perm"] || "P";
                csv.Order = json["Order"] || 1;
                csv.Flag = json["Flag"] || "D";
            } catch (error) {
                console.error("Missing necessary variables for calculation:", error);
            }
        } else {
            if ((naicsStatus.NAICS2 && naicsStatus.NAICS2.includes(csv["NAICS2"]?.toString())) || (naicsStatus.NAICS3 && naicsStatus.NAICS3.includes(csv["NAICS3"]?.toString())) || (naicsStatus.NAICS4 && naicsStatus.NAICS4.includes(csv["NAICS4"]?.toString())) || (naicsStatus.NAICS5 && naicsStatus.NAICS5.includes(csv["NAICS5"]?.toString())) || (naicsStatus.NAICS6 && naicsStatus.NAICS6.includes(csv["NAICS6"]?.toString()))) {
                if ((!naicsStatus["NAICS3!"] && !naicsStatus["NAICS4!"]) || (naicsStatus["NAICS3!"] && !naicsStatus["NAICS3!"].includes(csv["NAICS3"].toString())) || (naicsStatus["NAICS4!"] && !naicsStatus["NAICS4!"].includes(csv["NAICS4"].toString()))) {
                    if (!naicsStatus["_TXRCD00"] || (naicsStatus["_TXRCD00"] && naicsStatus["_TXRCD00"].includes(csv["_TXRCD00"]))) {
                        try {
                            const derivedValue = eval(calculation);
                            csv[derivedItem] = derivedValue;
                            csv.Perm = json["Temp or Perm"] || "P";
                            csv.Order = json["Order"] || 1;
                            csv.Flag = json["Flag"] || "D";
                        } catch (error) {
                            console.error("Missing necessary variables for calculation:", error);
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}

for (const json of items) {
    const naicsStatus = json["NAICS/Tax status"];
    const unit = json["UNIT"];
    const derivedItem = json["DERIVED ITEM"];
    const calculation = json["CALCULATION"];

    if (
        naicsStatus &&
        unit === csv["UNIT"]
    ) {
        if (naicsStatus == "All") {
            try {
                const derivedValue = eval(calculation);
                csv[derivedItem] = derivedValue;
                csv.Perm = json["Temp or Perm"] || "P";
                csv.Order = json["Order"] || 1;
                csv.Flag = json["Flag"] || "D";
            } catch (error) {
                console.error("Missing necessary variables for calculation:", error);
            }
        } else {
            if ((naicsStatus.NAICS2 && naicsStatus.NAICS2.includes(csv["NAICS2"]?.toString())) || (naicsStatus.NAICS3 && naicsStatus.NAICS3.includes(csv["NAICS3"]?.toString())) || (naicsStatus.NAICS4 && naicsStatus.NAICS4.includes(csv["NAICS4"]?.toString())) || (naicsStatus.NAICS5 && naicsStatus.NAICS5.includes(csv["NAICS5"]?.toString())) || (naicsStatus.NAICS6 && naicsStatus.NAICS6.includes(csv["NAICS6"]?.toString()))) {
                if ((!naicsStatus["NAICS3!"] && !naicsStatus["NAICS4!"]) || (naicsStatus["NAICS3!"] && !naicsStatus["NAICS3!"].includes(csv["NAICS3"].toString())) || (naicsStatus["NAICS4!"] && !naicsStatus["NAICS4!"].includes(csv["NAICS4"].toString()))) {
                    if (!naicsStatus["_TXRCD00"] || (naicsStatus["_TXRCD00"] && naicsStatus["_TXRCD00"].includes(csv["_TXRCD00"]))) {
                        try {
                            const derivedValue = eval(calculation);
                            csv[derivedItem] = derivedValue;
                            csv.Perm = json["Temp or Perm"] || "P";
                            csv.Order = json["Order"] || 1;
                            csv.Flag = json["Flag"] || "D";
                        } catch (error) {
                            console.error("Missing necessary variables for calculation:", error);
                        }
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
// msg.payload.csv[0] = csv

return msg;

name: logical edits function
func:
const items = [
    {
        "VARIABLE": "TYPOP_CODE_STAT  RCPT_COMSN_GSV_VAL RCPT_OWN_VAL \nRCPT_TOT_VAL",
        "UNIT": "estab",
        "NAICS": "NAICS3='425'",
        "CONDITION ": "TYPOP_CODE_STAT eq '4X' and RCPT_COMSN_GSV_VAL + RCPT_OWN_VAL ne RCPT_TOT_VAL",
        "ACTION": "set review flag"
    },
    {
        "VARIABLE": "TYPOP_CODE_STAT  RCPT_COMSN_GSV_VAL RCPT_COMSN_EARN_VAL RCPT_COMSN_AVG_RATE ",
        "UNIT": "estab",
        "NAICS": "NAICS3='425'",
        "CONDITION ": "TYPOP_CODE_STAT eq '4X' and RCPT_COMSN_GSV_VAL not in (0,.) and RCPT_COMSN_EARN_VAL in (0,.) and RCPT_COMSN_AVG_RATE not in (0,.)",
        "ACTION": "RCPT_COMSN_EARN_VAL = RCPT_COMSN_GSV_VAL * RCPT_COMSN_AVG_RATE",
        " DESCRIPTION": "if they reported a gross selling value from goods gold on commission, and an average commission rate, but didn't provide the amount of commissions (or set to 0), use GSV * average commission rate to derive commission"
    },
    {
        "VARIABLE": "TYPOP_CODE_STAT  RCPT_COMSN_GSV_VAL RCPT_COMSN_EARN_VAL RCPT_COMSN_AVG_RATE ",

return msg;
